Quickstrike:





Quickstrike leaned against the corridor wall and mused. Shredder came to his 
attention. A bot said he was put on-line because of him. "Hey Shredder!" he 
said to his comm-link. "Ah want ya t' go outside an' go find uh pod. Bring 
it back b'fore it scans uh beast mode. Put in on stand-by and bring it back 
as fast as you can. Me an Boss-bot gots an idea. Sub-commander's orders."
